{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3538627,"name":"Riley","username":"ProbablyFRC","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/p/3da27b/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-24T21:04:57.431Z","cooked":"

Hey! Absolute noob here
Our team is having trouble with keeping the swerve modules aligned when driving. Typically we go into the Phoenix X tuner and calibrate our CANcoders which makes the wheels align perfectly for a few power cycles. Eventually its either when we re-enable or power cycle (not sure which does it) one or two modules go way out of line. We are running one click swerve with kraken x60s for drive and turn.

Ask away if you need, I’ll try to find an answer for yall

Potentially silly question.

Have you checked the magnets for the encoders are secure (e.g. super glued/loctite)
